profiles.name: TreeHouse
profiles.paragraph: I used treehouse in start of my career I finished design and front end track after that I stop treehouse for personal reason then after that I took other courses in Udemy and I started to practice and build websites. Now I started with JavaScript course.

profiles.name: Udemy
profiles.paragraph: I have completed some jQuery and sass courses in Udemy, and while I took these course I build website with them.

profiles.name: CodeCademy
profiles.paragraph: I have finished more than 5 course in codecademy I used when I started to learn about programing. i started with python in start but it was little difficult for me and I choose to start from front end and grow from there.

profiles.name: FreeCodeCamp
profiles.paragraph: Now that I have started with JavaScript track in treehouse I have started freecodecamp JavaScript part from start and also use the w3Reasourses exercise to learn coding and learn to solve problem.

profiles.name: KhanAcademy
profiles.paragraph: khanacademy before I used it to learn programming i used it to earn mathematics. it was for 8 months ago I learned some basic HTML and css in it and some animation with CSS

profiles.name: Github
profiles.paragraph: This is my Github With all my respositorys, click her if you want to see all the Websites that i have created
